main event: A witness observed a UFO believed to be an aircraft with flashing red lights over Smithville, Tennessee on April 28, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as round and the size of a basketball., The sighting lasted approximately three minutes., The witness reported that the object made several stops and hovered before disappearing., The observer was initially uncertain whether it was an aircraft., The report concluded it was possibly an aircraft based on the observer's description.
witness description: The witness was an observer who described the object as a flashing red light, estimating it was 200 or 300 feet above the surface.
